data.name: Simple Trains
data.detailed_description:
Simple Trains is a game where the player builds railroad tracks and manages locomotives, railroad cars and routes.

  • Build an efficient railroad network to keep all the commuters happy.
  • Transport the various types of people as swiftly as possible to their desired destination.
  • Delays will cause the commuters to get angry, lowering the satisfaction score.
  • After a set time, you will be evaluated on your performance. If your satisfaction score is in the negative, the game ends here. Otherwise, you can choose between updates, locomotives and railroad cars and continue on.

data.short_description: A game about building an efficient railroad network to keep all the commuters happy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Dual core 2.0Ghz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Quad core 2.4Ghz
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060
